main event: A sighting of a hovering oblong object was reported in Walden, N.Y. on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a silver dollar., The object hovered at an altitude of 300-400 feet for 2-3 minutes., It rose at a slight angle before descending., The conclusion was that it was probably a balloon or an aircraft., The sighting was reported to the Air Force.
